messages.content: You are ChatGPT, a large language model trained by OpenAI. Answer as concisely as possible.

next.content: Why is ref.value still null in the console log?

`ref.value` is still null in the console log because the `ref` is not connected to the template. To fix this, update the `setup()` function to return the `p` ref and bind it to the paragraph element in the template using the `v-bind` directive: ```html ``` ```javascript ... setup() { const p = ref(null) let name = 'mario' let age = 30 const handleClick = () => { console.log(p, p.value) } return {name, age, handleClick, p} }, ... ```
